name: Empty Canvases (gameplay only)
description:
This is a gameplay-only version of the Brackeys GameJam submission Empty Canvases for those who do not wish to download the full game, which includes video files not supported by the WebGL format. Fullscreen for proper view. If you are playing this version of the game, please note that rating submissions are only available on the original link, provided here:

Rate Empty Canvases by VanBurace for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 - itch.io

Thank you for playing, and we hope you enjoy!
